ac: 19, touch 16, flat-footed 15 (+3 armor, +1 deflection, +3 Dex, +1 dodge, +1 size)
special_attacks: +1 on attack rolls against goblinoid and reptilian humanoids, sneak attack +4d6
other_gear: mwk studded leather, mwk dagger, mwk light crossbow with 10 bolts, cloak of resistance +1, goggles of minute  seeing, ring of protection  +1, mwk artisan's tools, thieves' tools, 577 gp
feats: Dodge, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Skill Focus (Craft [traps])

sections.body: During Combat The rogue uses her crossbow to make direct attacks.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: This rogue excels at building, setting, and bypassing traps.

defensive_abilities: defensive training (+4 dodge bonus to AC vs. giants), evasion, improved uncanny dodge, trap sense +2
special_qualities: rogue talents (ledge walker, quick disable, resiliency, trap spotter), trapfinding +4
name: Trapsmith
skills: Acrobatics +14 (+10 when jumping), Bluff +11, Climb +10, Craft (traps) +20, Disable Device +19, Escape Artist +14, Knowledge (dungeoneering) +13, Knowledge (engineering) +10, Perception +14, Stealth +18, Use Magic Device +11
combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, scroll of knock, wand of detect magic (20 charges)
